headline: Generative AI deployment at Diablo Canyon is a first for US nuclear power sector: PG&E
summary: The NVIDIA-supported search and data retrieval application is the start of a series of AI-powered solutions vendor Atomic Canyon aims to deploy across the nuclear industry, CEO and co-founder Trey Lauderdale said.

headline: Itron, PG&E Announce Program to Support EV Charging with Grid Edge Intelligence
